name: R5-Library-R4-Library
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 Library into FHIR R4

element.display: Represents a library of quality improvement components

target.display: Represents a library of quality improvement components
target.comment: R5 `Library` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library`

element.display: When the library was approved by publisher

target.display: When the library was approved by publisher
target.comment: R5 `Library.approvalDate` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.approvalDate`
R5 `Library.author` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.author`
R5 `Library.contact` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.contact`
R5 `Library.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.contained`

element.display: Contents of the library, either embedded or referenced

target.display: Contents of the library, either embedded or referenced
target.comment: R5 `Library.content` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Library.content` - content has change due to type change: R5 `content` `Attachment` maps as RelatedTo for R4 `content`
R5 `Library.copyright` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.copyright`

element.display: What data is referenced by this library

target.display: What data is referenced by this library
target.comment: R5 `Library.dataRequirement` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Library.dataRequirement` - dataRequirement has change due to type change: R5 `dataRequirement` `DataRequirement` maps as RelatedTo for R4 `dataRequirement`
R5 `Library.date` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.date`

element.display: Natural language description of the library

target.display: Natural language description of the library
target.comment: R5 `Library.description` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.description`
R5 `Library.editor` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.editor`

element.display: When the library is expected to be used

target.display: When the library is expected to be used
target.comment: R5 `Library.effectivePeriod` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.effectivePeriod`
R5 `Library.endorser` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.endorser`

element.display: For testing purposes, not real usage

target.display: For testing purposes, not real usage
target.comment: R5 `Library.experimental` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.experimental`

R5 `Library.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Library.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Library.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.id`
R5 `Library.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `Library.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.implicitRules`
R5 `Library.jurisdiction` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.jurisdiction`

R5 `Library.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `Library.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`

element.display: When the library was last reviewed by the publisher

target.display: When the library was last reviewed
target.comment: R5 `Library.lastReviewDate` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.lastReviewDate`
R5 `Library.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.meta`

R5 `Library.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Library.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `Library.name` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.name`
R5 `Library.parameter` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Library.parameter` - parameter has change due to type change: R5 `parameter` `ParameterDefinition` maps as RelatedTo for R4 `parameter`

element.display: Name of the publisher/steward (organization or individual)

target.display: Name of the publisher (organization or individual)
target.comment: R5 `Library.publisher` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.publisher`
R5 `Library.purpose` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.purpose`

R5 `Library.relatedArtifact` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Library.relatedArtifact` - relatedArtifact has change due to type change: R5 `relatedArtifact` `RelatedArtifact` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `relatedArtifact`
R5 `Library.reviewer` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.reviewer`

R5 `Library.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/publication-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/publication-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: Type of individual the library content is focused on

target.display: Type of individual the library content is focused on
target.comment: R5 `Library.subject[x]` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.subject[x]`
R5 `Library.subtitle` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.subtitle`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `Library.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.text`
R5 `Library.title` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.title`
R5 `Library.topic` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.topic`
R5 `Library.type` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.type`

element.display: Canonical identifier for this library, represented as a URI (globally unique)

target.display: Canonical identifier for this library, represented as a URI (globally unique)
target.comment: R5 `Library.url` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.url`

element.display: Describes the clinical usage of the library

target.display: Describes the clinical usage of the library
target.comment: R5 `Library.usage` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Library.usage` - usage has change due to type change: R5 usage markdown has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 usage

element.display: The context that the content is intended to support

target.display: The context that the content is intended to support
target.comment: R5 `Library.useContext` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.useContext`
R5 `Library.version` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Library.version`
